description: Roni Horn's work is often inspired by natural elements, and Deeps and Skies, made from reheated and molded glass, evokes both water and sky. As she described, “When you stand by any body of water, there’s a whole history of reverie that clicks on . . . . water becomes a form—of consciousness, of time . . . of anything I want it to be."
title: Deeps and Skies
